casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

October, 1955.

(October 26, 1955.) Mary G. Riggs, Respondent, v. Arthur W. Riggs, Appellant.

All concur. (Appeal from a judgment of Erie Equity Term for plaintiff in an action for a separation.) Present — McCurn, P. J., Vaughan, Kimball, Wheeler and Van Duser, JJ.
